sentences.en: Every step forward requires testing the ground ahead for shifting sands.
sentences.cn: 每前进一步都可能遇到意想不到的困难.

sentences.en: He had been a rock in the shifting sands of her existence.
sentences.cn: 他一直是她曲折坎坷的生活中的主心骨。

sentences.en: He stopped, shifting his cane to his left hand.
sentences.cn: 他停了下来，将手杖移到左手。

sentences.en: He was shifting about uneasily in his chair.
sentences.cn: 他在椅子上不安地动来动去.

sentences.en: Historically, shifting cultivation was not limited to the tropics.
sentences.cn: 历史上烧垦农业并不限于热带.

sentences.en: It was a constant war, and you face a constantly shifting target.
sentences.cn: 它是一场持续不断的战争, 你所面对的目标是不断地变换的.
清除积雪是很吃力的工作.

sentences.en: Men and women hurried by in long, shifting lines.
sentences.cn: 她感到这不断的人流,像生活的滚滚波涛, 在奋斗在逐利.

sentences.en: Miss Ophelia lifted out the shifting papers of sweet herbs.
sentences.cn: 奥菲丽亚小姐把那几个包香料的破纸包取了出来.

sentences.en: Some measures are needed to secure the farmland against shifting sand.
sentences.cn: 需要采取措施使农田免遭流沙的侵袭.

sentences.en: The Croatian town of Ilok is a classic case of shifting populations.
sentences.cn: 伊洛卡的克罗地亚小镇就是人口不停流动的典型例子。

sentences.en: The goal of shifting freight from road to rail has been quietly abandoned.
sentences.cn: 已经悄悄放弃了将货物从公路改走铁路运输的目标。

sentences.en: These tree belts effectively protect the farmland against shifting sand.
sentences.cn: 这些防护林带有效地保护了农田,使之免受流沙侵袭.

sentences.en: To put it bluntly , this is shifting responsibility.
sentences.cn: 说穿了, 无非是想推卸责任.

sentences.en: We have planted trees as a hedge against shifting sand.
sentences.cn: 我们植树以防流沙的侵袭.
